LUKE 15.16 jah gairnida sad itan haurne, þoei matidedun sweina, jah manna imma ni gaf.
LUKE 15.17 qimands þan in sis qaþ:
ƕan filu asnje attins meinis ufarassau haband hlaibe, iþ ik huhrau fraqistna.
LUKE 15.18 usstandands gagga du attin meinamma jah qiþa du imma:
atta, frawaurhta mis in himin jah in andwairþja þeinamma;
LUKE 15.19 ju þanaseiþs ni im wairþs ei haitaidau sunus þeins;
gatawei mik swe ainana asnje þeinaize.
LUKE 15.20 jah usstandands qam at attin seinamma.
nauhþanuh þan fairra wisandan gasaƕ ina atta is jah infeinoda jah þragjands draus ana hals is jah kukida imma.
LUKE 15.21 jah qaþ imma sa sunus:
atta, frawaurhta in himin jah in andwairþja þeinamma,
ju þanaseiþs ni im wairþs ei haitaidau sunus þeins.
LUKE 15.22 qaþ þan sa atta du skalkam seinaim:
sprauto bringiþ wastja þo frumiston jah gawasjiþ ina jah gibiþ figgragulþ in handu is jah gaskohi ana fotuns is;
LUKE 15.23 jah bringandans stiur þana alidan ufsneiþiþ, jah matjandans wisam waila;
LUKE 15.24 unte sa sunus meins dauþs was jah gaqiunoda, jah fralusans was jah bigitans warþ;
jah dugunnun wisan.
LUKE 15.25 was-uþ-þan sunus is sa alþiza ana akra;
jah qimands atiddja neƕ razn jah gahausida saggwins jah laikins.
LUKE 15.26 jah athaitands sumana magiwe frahuh ƕa wesi þata.
LUKE 15.27 þaruh is qaþ du imma þatei
broþar þeins qam, jah ufsnaiþ atta þeins stiur þana alidan, unte hailana ina andnam.
LUKE 15.28 þanuh modags warþ jah ni wilda inngaggan, iþ atta is usgaggands ut bad ina.
LUKE 15.29 þaruh is andhafjands qaþ du attin:
sai, swa filu jere skalkinoda þus jah ni ƕanhun anabusn þeina ufariddja, jah mis ni aiw atgaft gaitein, ei miþ frijondam meinaim biwesjau;
LUKE 15.30 iþ þan sa sunus þeins, saei fret þein swes miþ kalkjom, qam, ufsnaist imma stiur þana alidan.
LUKE 15.31 þaruh qaþ du imma:
barnilo, þu sinteino miþ mis is, jah all þata mein þein ist;
LUKE 15.32 waila wisan jah faginon skuld was, unte broþar þeins dauþs was jah gaqiunoda, jah fralusans jah bigitans warþ.
LUKE 16.1 Qaþ-uþ-þan du siponjam seinaim:
manne sums was gabeigs, saei aihta fauragaggjan, jah sa frawrohiþs warþ du imma ei distahidedi aigin is.
LUKE 16.2 jah atwopjands ina qaþ du imma:
duƕe þata hausja fram þus?
usgif raþjon fauragaggjis þeinis,
ni magt auk ju þanamais fauragaggja wisan.
LUKE 16.3 qaþ þan in sis sa fauragaggja:
ƕa taujau, þandei frauja meins afnimiþ fauragaggi af mis?
graban ni mag,
bidjan skama mik.
LUKE 16.4 andþahta mik ƕa taujau, ei þan, biþe afsatjaidau us fauragaggja, andnimaina mik in gardins seinans.
LUKE 16.5 jah athaitands ainƕarjanoh faihuskulane fraujins seinis qaþ þamma frumistin:
ƕan filu skalt fraujin meinamma?
LUKE 16.6 þaruh qaþ:
taihuntaihund kase alewis.
jah qaþ du imma:
nim þus bokos jah gasitands sprauto gamelei fim tiguns.
LUKE 16.7 þaþroh þan du anþaramma qaþ:
aþþan þu, ƕan filu skalt?
iþ is qaþ:
taihuntaihund mitade kaurnis.
jah qaþ du imma:
nim þus bokos jah melei ahtautehund.
LUKE 16.8 jah hazida sa frauja þana fauragaggjan inwindiþos, unte frodaba gatawida;
unte þai sunjos þis aiwis frodozans sunum liuhadis in kunja seinamma sind.
LUKE 16.9 jah ik izwis qiþa:
taujaiþ izwis frijonds us faihuþraihna inwindiþos, ei þan ufligaiþ, andnimaina izwis in aiweinos hleiþros.
LUKE 16.10 saei triggws ist in leitilamma jah in managamma triggws ist;
jah sa in leitilamma untriggwa jah in managamma untriggws ist.
LUKE 16.11 jabai nu in inwindamma faihuþraihna triggwai ni waurþuþ, þata sunjeino ƕas izwis galaubeiþ?
LUKE 16.12 jah jabai in þamma framaþjin triggwai ni waurþuþ, þata izwar ƕas izwis gibiþ?
LUKE 16.13 ni ainshun þiwe mag twaim fraujam skalkinon;
andizuh ainana fijaiþ jah anþarana frijoþ, aiþþau ainamma andtiloþ, iþ anþaramma frakann;
